HEADERS
    First 43 bytes are always the copyright text: ".biff" File Format Copyright © Ficles 2024
    00100010 00101110 01100010 01101001 01100110 01100110 00100010 00100000 01000110 01101001 01101100 01100101 00100000 01000110 01101111 01110010 01101101 01100001 01110100 00100000 01000011 01101111 01110000 01111001 01110010 01101001 01100111 01101000 01110100 00100000 10101001 00100000 01000110 01101001 01100011 01101100 01100101 01110011 00100000 00110010 00110000 00110010 00110100
    Then the index of first byte of the image: 109 
    01101101
    Then the image name in unicode: example
    01100101 01111000 01100001 01101101 01110000 01101100 01100101
    Followed by a null space
    00000000
    Then two 16 bit numbers directly one after the other representing the x and y size of the image : 8, 7
    00000000 00001000
    00000000 00001000
    Then the image creator name: example creator
    01100101 01111000 01100001 01101101 01110000 01101100 01100101 00100000 01100011 01110010 01100101 01100001 01110100 01101111 01110010
    Followed by a null space
    00000000
    Then the copyright text for the image: Image Copyright © example creator 2024
    01001001 01101101 01100001 01100111 01100101 00100000 01000011 01101111 01110000 01111001 01110010 01101001 01100111 01101000 01110100 00100000 10101001 00100000 01100101 01111000 01100001 01101101 01110000 01101100 01100101 00100000 01100011 01110010 01100101 01100001 01110100 01101111 01110010 00100000 00110010 00110000 00110010 00110100
    Followed by a null space
    00000000
IMAGE
    Just 3 8 bit numbers representing the colour of each pixel repeated for each pixel
